SEARCH
Module flag4j

Package org.flag4j.linalg.ops.dense_sparse.coo.field_ops

package org.flag4j.linalg.ops.dense_sparse.coo.field_ops
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DenseCooFieldEquals
    This class provides methods for checking the equality of a dense field tensor with a sparse field tensor.
    DenseCooFieldMatMult
    This utility class provides low level methods for computing the matrix multiplication between a sparse/dense matrix and dense/sparse matrix/vector.
    DenseCooFieldMatMultTranspose
    This class contains several low level methods for computing matrix-matrix multiplications with a transpose for a complex dense matrix and a complex sparse matrix.
    DenseCooFieldMatrixOperations
    This class contains low level implementations for operations between a dense and a sparse field matrix.
    DenseCooFieldTensorOperations
    This class contains methods to apply common operations to a dense/sparse field matrix and to a sparse/dense field matrix.
    DenseCooFieldVectorOperations
    This class provides low level methods for computing operations between dense/sparse and sparse/dense field vectors.
